 8:       def call(env)
 9:         env["PATH_INFO"] ||= ""
10:         env["SCRIPT_NAME"] ||= ""
11:         controller = @app.run(env['rack.input'], env)
12:         h = controller.headers
13:         h.each_pair do |k,v|
14:           if v.kind_of? URI
15:             h[k] = v.to_s
16:           end
17:         end
18:         [controller.status, controller.headers, [controller.body.to_s]]
19:       end
